Summary

This is the automatically-generated reference manual of the C++ egglib-cpp library. The library is presented as several modules, but note that they are only used to structure the documentation.

There is a single namespace (egglib) in which all classes are defined. See an example of programming with egglib-cpp in the EggLib package main documentation. Use "Modules" or "Classes" above to navigate in the library reference manual.
